title: [Large-Scale] Learner-Centered Entrepreneurial English Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and general understanding of entrepreneurship
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized learner engagement design utilizing digital devices, focusing on enhancing English communication skills applicable to real-world entrepreneurial scenarios.

learning_goals: Capable of composing three or more situational dialogues using 50 basic business English vocabulary terms related to entrepreneurship.
Perform English collaborative tasks with peer learners three or more times weekly via digital platforms.
Present core sections of a business plan (problem definition, solution, revenue model) in English with an 80% or higher achievement rate based on formative assessment criteria.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
